import React, {useState} from 'react' const Edit = (props) => { let emptyDog = {id: '', name: '', breed: '', age: '', gender: '', color: '', image: '', weight: ''} const [dog, setDog] = useState(emptyDog) const handleChange = (event) => { setDog({...dog, [event.target.name]: event.target.value}) } const handleSubmit = (event) =>{ event.preventDefault() props.handleCreate(dog) } return ( <>
Edit Dog














) } export default Edit
